title: Everglades National Park: Hearing
body: Hearing       Everglades National Park provides a variety of services to accommodate those with hearing enhancement needs.visitors with special hearing enhancement needs. VISITOR CENTERS Films shown at the Ernest F. Coe Visitor Center, Shark Valley Visitor Center  and Gulf Coast Visitor Center include captioning. Additionally Assistive Listening Devices (ALD) are available upon request for use during Ranger -led interpretive programs. CONCESSION BOAT AND TRAM TOURS The Shark Valley Tram Tour and the Gulf Coast boat tour offer ALD upon request for interpretive programs.                             Accessibility   6 Photos            Mobility   10 Photos            Hearing   5 Photos
